name: Bright Lights of Svetlov
description:
Soviet Union, mid 1980s. A small industrial town somewhere in Russia. Panel housing, ordinary repetitive jobs, boring household activities. Take a look at what family life was, and at it's gradual descend under the harsh trials.
Carefully depicted atmosphere of USSR.Linear, story-focused experience.
Do your daily routine and get to know about family members.
Playtime of approximately 1.5 hours.
